testcase.name: chromium › Vehicles Module functionality › 041_ verify we cannot add drivers if they are not found in employee master data
testcase.system-out: Given Navigate to Dashboard with "english" language.......................passed Then verify that dashboard page tab name contains QUGEM...................passed When click to Vehicles module.............................................passed Then delete if a vehicle is added for test purpose ,Vehicle plate is "T...passed Then click add vehicle button.............................................passed Then fill in the input boxes of "TE ST 3000" , "Mercedes" , "A5","Sprin...passed When click save changes in vehicles edit page.............................passed Then verify alert message text is "Vehicle was added successfully.."......passed Then I navigate to vehicles Module "https://qugem-staging.netlify.app/a...passed Then I write in the filter "TE ST 3000"...................................passed Then I click usage button.................................................passed Then I see the "TE ST 3000", "Mercedes", and "A5" of the vehicle before...passed Then I verify there are header like below:................................passed Then I click add button and fill the input boxes with the data below:.....passed Then verify the actual page url contains this part of the URL "https://...passed Then I write in the filter "TE ST 3000"...................................passed Then I verify first row with "TE ST 3000" has Brand name "Mercedes" and...passed Then verify vehicle status is not "Idle"..................................passed Then verify driver names are correctly visible in the first row:..........failed
